LanguageData.Airship_Kirov.label: kirov airship
LanguageData.Airship_Kirov.description:
A huge airship model used by the ancients who liked to paint everything red. Its original bomb rack is not ready due to lost technology, but still easy to the explode. Beware the fire.
Seat: 6 Speed: 1 Cargo capacity: 600kg
Fuel capacity: 150 Fuel efficiency: 1 per tile
LanguageData.Airship_Standard.label: standard airship
LanguageData.Airship_Standard.description:
An airship with standard specifications. It's just slightly faster than walking speed, but unaffected by terrain so can easily cross sea and mountains.
Seat: 3 Speed: 1 Cargo capacity: 200kg
Fuel capacity: 100 Fuel efficiency: 0.5 per tile
LanguageData.Bullet_KirovTurret.label: vapor
LanguageData.Bullet_MediumCarryallTurret.label: bullet
LanguageData.Bullet_MiniCarryallTurret.label: bullet
LanguageData.Carryall_GDI.label: ox carryall
LanguageData.Carryall_GDI.description:
A rare model of the carryall used by the ancients who worshiped a turkey-like symbol. Optimized for mass transportation, it is rather cramped up due to the extra storage.
Ox carryall is equipped with a small turret. This is helpful in battle, but consumes a lot of fuel. Always remember that you need enough fuel to get back home.
Seat: 4 Speed: 3.5 Cargo capacity: 1,400kg
Fuel capacity: 600 Fuel efficiency: 3 per tile
LanguageData.Carryall_Nod.label: vertigo carryall
LanguageData.Carryall_Nod.description:
A rare model of the carryall used by the ancients who worshiped an insect-like symbol. It was optimized for assault operations, can transport large numbers of people quickly and far, but at the cost of storage capacity.
Vertigo carryall is equipped with a minigun turret. This is helpful in battle, but consumes a lot of fuel. Always remember that you need enough fuel to get back home.
Seat: 10 Speed: 5 Cargo capacity: 800kg
Fuel capacity: 450 Fuel efficiency: 3 per tile
LanguageData.Carryall_standard.label: standard carryall
LanguageData.Carryall_standard.description:
A minor replica model of the standard space shuttle from the stellar empire, but with no orbital navigation capabilities. No longer are you bound to your settlement.
Seats: 5 Speed: 4 Cargo capacity: 450kg
Fuel capacity: 200 Fuel efficiency: 1.5 per tile
LanguageData.Gun_KirovTurret.label: steam nozzle
LanguageData.Gun_KirovTurret.description: The kirov airship can small vapor explosion at nearby targets via external nozzles. It's not very effective in combat, but it's worth a try.
LanguageData.Gun_KirovTurret.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: steam nozzle
LanguageData.Gun_MediumCarryallTurret.label: medium carryall turret gun
LanguageData.Gun_MediumCarryallTurret.description: A automatic minigun made to be mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.Gun_MiniCarryallTurret.label: carryall turret gun
LanguageData.Gun_MiniCarryallTurret.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.
